channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling Connect:Express for UNIX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling Connect:Express for UNIX

item.title: CVE-2023-29259|2024-08-02T14:00:15.888Z -- ibm -- sterling%20connect%3Aexpress%20for%20unix
item.description: IBM Sterling Connect:Express for UNIX 1.5 browser UI is vulnerable to attacks that rely on the use of cookies without the SameSite attribute. IBM X-Force ID: 252055.

item.title: CVE-2023-29260|2024-08-02T14:00:15.899Z -- ibm -- sterling%20connect%3Aexpress%20for%20unix
item.description: IBM Sterling Connect:Express for UNIX 1.5 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 252135.

item.title: CVE-2023-26023|2024-08-02T11:39:06.445Z -- ibm -- sterling%20connect%3Aexpress%20for%20unix
item.description: Planning Analytics Cartridge for Cloud Pak for Data 4.0 exposes sensitive information in logs which could lead an attacker to exploit this vulnerability to conduct further attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 247896.

item.title: CVE-2023-32331|2024-08-02T15:10:24.878Z -- ibm -- sterling%20connect%3Aexpress%20for%20unix
item.description: IBM Connect:Express for UNIX 1.5.0 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow that could allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service through its browser UI. IBM X-Force ID: 254979.

item.title: CVE-2023-32331|2024-06-04T17:26:18.338Z -- ibm -- sterling%20connect%3Aexpress%20for%20unix
item.description: IBM Connect:Express for UNIX 1.5.0 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow that could allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service through its browser UI. IBM X-Force ID: 254979.
